TopicTitle: What top 10 (or less) mods couldn't you do without?

Articles.Content: Realism Overhaul, required and recommended mods, scansat from the suggested

> 
> 
> 15 minutes ago, John FX said:
> 
> 
> Realism Overhaul, required and recommended mods, scansat from the suggested
> 

This is 15 or 20 mods ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif ";)")

> 
> 
> 10 hours ago, winged said:
> 
> 
> This is 15 or 20 mods ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif ";)")
> 

I don`t agree as I use the 6 pack of beer defence.

When in the supermarket and in the `10 items or less` I don`t count every beer so a six pack is one item.

RO is like that.

Non parts-pack mods

1: [MechJeb](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/111978-105-anatid-robotics-mumech-mechjeb-autopilot-256-23-feb-2016/)

1½: [MJ & KER ∀](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/75295-0235-mechjeb-and-engineer-for-all/)

2: [Kerbal Engineer Redux](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/17833-105-kerbal-engineer-redux-v10194/)

3: [Editor Extensions Redux](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/127378-editor-extensions-redux-301-released-with-selectroot-merge/)

4: [QuickSearch](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/85834-1045-malahs-quick-mods/)

5: [Landing Height Display](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/69127-105apr2715-landing-height-show-distance-from-bottom-of-your-vessel-to-ground/)

6: [Part Commander](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/114902-105-part-commander-quick-access-to-part-right-click-action-menus-v103-nov-20-2015/)

7: [Graphic Memory Monitor](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/83821-10x-gcmonitor-127-a-graphic-memory-monitor-july-8th/)

8: [BetterBurnTime](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/126111-105-betterburntime-v134-accurate-burn-time-indicator-on-navball-no-more-na/)

9: [Trajectories](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/94368-105-trajectories-v145-2015-12-05-atmospheric-predictions/)

10: [Ship Manifest](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/56643-105-ship-manifest-crew-science-resources-v-5010-14-mar-16/)/[Connected Living Spaces](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/109972-105-connected-living-space-v1201-01-dec-2015-customize-your-cls-parts/)

Parts-pack mods

1: [SDHI Svc Module System](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/48073-105-sum-dum-heavy-industries-service-module-system-v31-13-february-2016/) ([including](https://github.com/Starwaster/AnimatedDecouplers) [its](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/55219-Module-Manager-2-1-5-%28May-22%29) [dependencies](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/52931-105wenkel-corporation-realchute-parachute-systems-v1327-4216/))

2: [Dr. Jet's ChopShop](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/76248-105-dr-jets-chop-shop-v0801-10122015/) (Best solar panels I've found in any addon ever)

3: Nertea's [Near Future](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/47786-105-near-future-technologies-feb-20-bugfixing/) & [Other](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/130503-105-kerbal-atomics-fancy-nuclear-engines-20022016-fixes-nfe-support/) [Stockalike](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/82833-105-stockalike-station-parts-expansion-06012016-105-update-and-bugfixes/) [Parts](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/112027-105-heat-control-more-radiators-updated-27122015-minor-fixes/) [Packs](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/106089-105-cryogenic-engines-high-isp-chemical-rockets-110216-balancing-bugfixes/)

4: [RLA StockAlike](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/81386-105-rla-stockalike-133-20-dec/)

5: [Kerbal Stock Part eXpansion](https://github.com/StupidChris/KSPX) (available for KSP v1.0.5 through CKAN)

6: [Lack's Stock eXTension](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/71992-105-sxt-lacks-stock-extension-sxt-24-09dec15kscv3/)

7: [HomeGrownRockets](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/55521-102hgr-1875m-partsv130-released/) (with [Community Fixes](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/131556-104-5-hgr-community-fixes-home-grown-fixes-for-home-grown-rockets-v12-2016-mar-01/)) + [Corvus](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/108993-102corvus-size-1-two-kerbal-command-podversion-111/) (with Corvus Extras) (I consider Corvus to be part of the HomeGrownRockets pack)

8: NecroBones' [FuelTanksPlus](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/97541-105-fuel-tanks-plus-17-2016-03-11/) & [ColorCodedCanisters](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/94336-105-color-coded-canisters-142-2015-12-20/)

9: Vanguard Astrodynamics' [VX Engine Series](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/133129-105-vx-series-ii-engine-pack-new-shiny/)

10: Angel125's [Mark One Laboratory Extensions](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/94352-alpha-105-mark-one-laboratory-extensions-mole-v042/)

I know that splitting them like that might be considered cheating but I kind-of had to do it this way.

In no particular order:

<abbr title="Kerbal Inventory System (mod)">KIS</abbr>+<abbr title="Kerbal Attachment System (mod)">KAS</abbr> (inventories/tethers)

Kerbal Engineer Redux (stats like delta-v, <abbr title="Thrust-to-weight ratio">TWR</abbr>, etc)  

Trajectories (your trajectory including drag, lift and aerodynamics)

Karibou Rover (exploration rovers)

MRS + FueltanksPlus (rocket parts and fuel tank nose cones)

RLA Stockalike (more parts)

RealChute (better chute physics)

DMagic Orbital Science (tons more science parts)

OPT (more spaceplane parts)

Hullcam (cameras)  

(And things like ModuleManager and InterstellarFuelSwitch so these mods can run!![:rolleyes:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_rolleyes.gif ":rolleyes:"))

KOPERNICUS.

KUMAR'S DWARF STARS.

That's it! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif ":D")

1. <abbr title="Kerbal Engineer Redux (mod)">KER</abbr>

2. MechJeb

3. Filter Extensions

4. Near Future Tech (counting Cryo Engines and Kerbal Atomics)

5. AmpYear

6. SpaceY

7. Rastor Prop Monitor

8. Docking Port Alignment Indicator

9. Hyperedit

10. Mk2 expansion

Yeah, once you go <abbr title="Realism Overhaul (mod)">RO</abbr>... there really is no going back. So after learning the fundamentals, i could no longer really play stock KSP, which makes the <abbr title="Real Solar System (mod)">RSS</abbr>/<abbr title="Realism Overhaul (mod)">RO</abbr>/RP-0 a must have for me from now on. KSP is awesome it really is, but what this modding community has done is take the game to the next level. I encourage everyone who has been ksping forever and never gotten into RP-0, now is great time. So far its been very stable and an amazing experience. Wish I could give all the modders a hug.

BD Armory

Throttle Controlled Avionics

Kie Fighter Ion Engine

Hyperedit

Kerbal Aircraft Expansion

Kerbal Inventory System

Kerbal Attachment System

GN Drive (if you don't know how to plot a course to your target, just go so fast you fly straight to it)

Mk2 Expansion

TCA is awesome for me, now I can use my hover tanks, without using those actually hover pads from another mod I tried. Much easier control in the case of TCA.

Kie Fighter mod gives me a cheat/vanilla engine. Powerful, but has restrictions.

I can't go that long without any Kopernicus pack installed, especially ones like Kumar's Dwarf Stars\*, Outer Planets Mod, or any pack that adds in new stars. I also need HyperEdit to find Magic Boulders and test out planets I develop for Interstellar Adventure Revived and Kumar's Dwarf Stars.

\**Okay, I may be biased on that one, but at least it isn't as game-crashingly laggy as IA-Revived! I still like that one too.*

I've only been back to playing the game for a couple weeks. Even so, I'd say it would be impossible to specify "10 or less." There are just far too many awesome mods, and I have only begun to get them all installed.

That said, here is my mod list. So far, I'd call them ALL essential, though many of the ones that add stuff that is primarily late game I have yet to really experience.

![Gt0Bz.gif](http://tw.greywool.com/i/Gt0Bz.gif)

For me it would be:

Kerbal Engineer

Docking Port Alignment

<abbr title="Kerbal Attachment System (mod)">KAS</abbr>

<abbr title="Kerbal Inventory System (mod)">KIS</abbr>

Kerbal Alarm Clock
